title: Copy base components from FO-11
description:
## Objective

Copy 9 base components from FO-11 to FO-12 with minimal import path adjustments. These components are functionally identical to FO-11.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Section: "Reuse from FO-11"

## Scope

**Files to create (copy from app/fo-11/components/):**
1. app/fo-12/components/fragment-input.tsx — Unchanged
2. app/fo-12/components/heart-animation.tsx — Unchanged
3. app/fo-12/components/affirmation-card.tsx — Unchanged (individual card)
4. app/fo-12/components/step-background.tsx — Unchanged
5. app/fo-12/components/step-notifications.tsx — Unchanged
6. app/fo-12/components/step-paywall.tsx — Unchanged
7. app/fo-12/components/step-goal.tsx — Unchanged
8. app/fo-12/components/step-context.tsx — Unchanged
9. app/fo-12/components/step-tone.tsx — Unchanged

## Implementation

1. Create the directory app/fo-12/components/
2. Copy each file from app/fo-11/components/ to app/fo-12/components/
3. In each file, update any import paths that reference fo-11 to reference fo-12
4. Keep all component names, props, and behavior identical

## Tests

Verify: npx tsc --noEmit passes (may have import errors until types.ts exists, which is OK — this epic runs in parallel with foundation epic)

Do NOT close until all 9 files are created.
acceptance_criteria: All 9 base component files exist in app/fo-12/components/
closed_reason: Copied 9 base components from FO-11 to FO-12: fragment-input, heart-animation, affirmation-card, step-background, step-notifications, step-paywall, step-goal, step-context, step-tone. Updated step number guards (goal=3, context=4, tone=5) for FO-12 flow. Inlined GOAL_QUESTION constant in step-goal to avoid types.ts import. All files pass TypeScript compilation with no errors.
